definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rub away, beat fine, pulverize (so Ar. sah.aqa, sah.qun worn garment, thin clouds; Aram. [[שְׁחַק]], 4h.aq pilverize; Ecclus [[שחק]] Sir 6:36 is go often (wear by treading), Str cp. iter terere);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[אֲבָּנִים שָֽׁחֲקוּ מַיִם]] Job 14:19 waters rub away stones; 2 ms. [[וְשָׁחַקְתָּ֫]] Ex 30:36 (P; of pulverizing incense, v. [[דקק]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ); fig., acc. of foes, Impf. 1 S. sf. [[וְאֶשְׁחָקֵם]] 2Sa 22:43 (‖) = Ps 18:43.
